parameters: If the event calling this common event
collide with events with these notetag, do stuff.
For frozen, we'll use a check percentage with value of 30.
Meaning we have 40% chance to free this enemy.
You can remove the conditional check but that'll
make the skill to be too op.
You call, this is a game design aspect.

If player collide with events with these notetag then receive damage.

player from attacking and also reset combo count time
Reset player sprite to idle and make him jump backward 1 tile.
Also reset other properties like speed and Directional Fix

will change to Slot 1, Slot 2 or Slot 3.
Let's say I press R, Casting Slot will be Slot 2,
and when Player Cast Magic is on, it'll cast
whatever is in Casting Slot, which is now Slot 2.

a different animation base on the spell and they'll appear
in front of the player for every direction he's facing.

Wait for pressing attack to do combo 2.

Make player change direction to Cursor

If loaded ammo has bullets, shoot
If loaded ammo doesn't have any bullet and player still has ammo
If loaded ammo doesn't have bullet and there's no ammo to reload
